channel.title: [VPS 24/7]ArcaneWare 718[Converted from 667]
channel.description:
Hi everyone, We've worked on this server for a very long time, over a month in fact and never did any advertising because we didn't feel that it was ready. Well, now it is :)
We've fixed so many internal bugs that it's impossible to keep count.
Now before you go clicking links I'd like you to know this. Your password is never exposed as it's encrypted with sha256 and stored in our online database.
Media:
Videos: Promo Video (Before we updated to 718) [URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zXf_rYB--kc"]ArcaneWare Promo Video[/URL]
Current Progress on Custom quest boss fight (Don't worry, he won't be that strong upon release) [URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7qQ48ONo4i8"]Vanstrom Battle[/URL]
Images:
Home TELE Options: [IMG]http://arcaneware.info/screenshots/screens/hometele.jpg[/img]
Full Buying and Selling [IMG]http://arcaneware.info/screenshots/shops/buy.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://arcaneware.info/screenshots/shops/sell.jpg[/img]

Complete Gravestone System : [IMG]http://arcaneware.info/screenshots/screens/gravestone1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://arcaneware.info/screenshots/screens/gravestone2.jpg[/img]
Complete Fairy Ring System: [IMG]http://arcaneware.info/screenshots/screens/fairylist.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://arcaneware.info/screenshots/screens/fairydial.jpg[/img]
Real GE Prices: [IMG]http://arcaneware.info/screenshots/screens/prices1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://arcaneware.info/screenshots/screens/prices2.jpg[/img]
Azzanadra changes your spellbook: [IMG]http://arcaneware.info/screenshots/npcs/azzanadra.jpg[/img]
Ranis Drakan [IMG]http://arcaneware.info/screenshots/npcs/drakan.jpg[/img]
Max: [IMG]http://arcaneware.info/screenshots/npcs/maxemote.jpg[/img]
Nex [IMG]http://arcaneware.info/screenshots/npcs/nex.jpg[/img]
Corp [IMG]http://arcaneware.info/screenshots/npcs/corp.jpg[/img]
KBD [IMG]http://arcaneware.info/screenshots/npcs/kbd.jpg[/img]
QBD [IMG]http://arcaneware.info/screenshots/npcs/qbd.jpg[/img]
GWD [IMG]http://arcaneware.info/screenshots/areas/gwd.jpg[/img]

When you're ready to play just visit our website at [URL=http://"http://arcaneware.info"]http://arcaneware.info[/URL] to download the client or play via webclient.
Please note that to login you'll need a forum account.
Credits: Matrix team - base Grundyboy34 - Owner/Developer Lightx - Owner/Developer
